entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Hybrid iOS Disable Elastic Scrolling #6689
  • iOS Checkbox is causing an infinite loop #6687
    6.0.300
  • Drag and drop leads to crash #6684
  • SwitchCell is not compliant with best accessibility practices #6683
  • Shell Page layout Different Between Android and Windows #6680
  • [Enhancement] Provide Shell.TitleBarIsVisible #6679
  • ImageButton visual state does not reset #6676
  • Platform dependent file not found #6674
  • [Windows] <CollectionView.Footer> in connection with <SearchBar> #6672
  • [Android] <CollectionView.EmptyView> in connection with <SearchBar> #6671
  • PathFigureCollectionConverter.ParseStringToPathFigureCollection not working correctly #6670
  • MAUI Essentials sample redundantly copies file in MediaPicker sample #6667
  • Exception if swipe to dismiss modal page on iOS (Simulator, real device not tested yet) #6666
  • Give a possibility to disable overscroll in AppShell/ShellContent #6662
  • [Windows] Can't debug with OnAppearing() and Shell.Current.GoToAsync() #6661
  • MAUI Essentials MediaPicker CapturePhotoAsync on Windows distinguish between no camera and cancelled #6660
  • [Android] Horizontal Scrollable blank page #6659
  • ContentView does not respect IsClippedToBounds (does not clip children) #6656
  • [Question] async void in MAUI Essentials samples #6655
  • Can't Logout while using OnAppearing() [RC2] #6653
  • Navigation bar vanishes when recreating Shell on Windows #6652
  • [Android] ListView does not calculate RowHeight (uses fixed value?) #6651
  • SwipeView inaccessible for screenreader users on Android #6648
  • ListView ContextActions cause app to crash on Android #6647
  • How to change CornerRadius dynamically? #6646
  • Random System.NullReferenceException .Net Maui app under macOS #6645
  • GestureRecognizers inhibit CollectionView Selection on Android #6644
  • Maui build system ignores VS BuildAction=None and builds anyway #6642
  • MAUI clearing storage of app #6641
  • MAUI Blazor is loading forever on Android 6 #6640

Closed

  • Blazor WebView iOS Scrolling Behaves Strangely #6347
    6.0.300
  • [iOS] [Android] Grid measuring auto size row incorrectly when using RowSpan #4947
    6.0.300
  • [Android] NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces() returns strange values on Android 11 + IPv6 #6649
  • Grid only renders and lays out first child #4671
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • FlexLayout > Frame > FlexLayout > Any Content throws error. #3826
    6.0.300
  • FlexLayout doesn't size correctly. #3852
    6.0.300
  • FlexLayout doesn't measure out to full height when placed inside ScrollView #3848
    6.0.300
  • VisualStateGroup System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException: Exception has been thrown by the target of an invocation. #5946
    6.0.300
  • Setting Label.FontSize at runtime does not do anything #6650
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • bad grid layout #5571
    6.0.300
  • OnIdiom don't work correct on Shell - FlyoutBehavior #5524
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] Wrong CollectionView item size using MeasureFirstItem #4113
    6.0.300
  • CollectionView using Static property as ItemsSource is not working #4043
    6.0.300
  • Entry cursor position return to start #6675
  • Flyout margins and settings do not display correctly #4762
    6.0.300
  • Android application in Release requires permission whereas Debug does not #6576
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Verify Blazor Hybrid scenarios on Windows in multi window apps #5722
    6.0.300
  • [iOS]HorizontalLayoutOptions=Center but the editor still is displayed on start #5116
    6.0.300
  • [Windows] No Tabs #6654
  • GetSSLHostnameVerifier available for AndroidMessageHandler #6664
  • Blazor Desktop: Support for auth #2529
    6.0.300
  • Image does not show images from URL source #6658
  • Binding IsEnabled to a property of a singleton does not get updated #6657
  • Button with image sized incorrectly on Windows #5601
    6.0.300
  • IServiceCollection Not Being Initialized Using builder.Services.AddTransient<SomeCLRClass>() #6587
  • [BUG] Error NETSDK1005 after changes in .csproj file #6626
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Versioning my Maui Android App raise multiple errors #3690
    6.0.300
  • Width and Height value of ContentPage not filled #4915
    6.0.300
  • Build failed on current RC1 branch with java.lan-RuntimeException: com.android.tools.r8.CompilationFailedException (xamarin.google.guava.listenablefuture) #5776
    6.0.300
  • Application cannot be started on Windows - WINAPPSDKGENERATEPROJECTPRIFILE #5953
    6.0.300
  • image size calculation #5565
    6.0.300
  • Can't get BackgroundImage of ContentPage #4773
    6.0.300
  • MenuBarItems are not rendered if Title is not set #6303
    6.0.300

PullRequests

Created

  • Set Image ClipRect at origin when using AspectFill #6692
  • Set image clipping when content mode is scaleAspectFill #6690
  • Remove remaining asserts from PR 6237 #6686
  • [Shell/Win] Replace missing `PaneCustomContent` with `PaneHeader` prop for the FlyoutHeader #6685
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix usage of SimpleViewHolder on COllectionView Header and Footer #6682
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Exclude platform-specific items using metadata #6681
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • [X] find the TargetT of Setter for VSM in Triggers #6668
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Correctly size the ImageButton BitmapImage #6663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button

Merged

  • Blazor Hybrid iOS Safe Areas #6432
    area/blazor 🕸️, platform/iOS 🍎, 6.0.300
  • [ci] Fix android pool devices #6688
  • Ensure Grid is only using visible Views for * height/width calculations #6677
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013
    area/essentials 🍞, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Fix for 3848 - FlexLayout doesn't measure content #6085
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Update to rc2 #6678
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update AdaptiveTrigger to support multi-window #6627
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Trigger the Font update for IFontElement controls #6665
    t/bug, p/0, area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Restore and fix tvOS checks and annotations and remove PlatformVersion #6636
    area/architecture, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [templates] add Android INTERNET permission #6673
    platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Fix MAUI Blazor crash for multi-window Windows apps #6516
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22211.3 to 7.0.0-preview1.22229.1 #6669
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1020.30 to 1.0.1185.39 #6308
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [singleproject] fix changing $(ApplicationDisplayVersion) inside VS #6628
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Tizen] Renaming APIs Native to Platform #6643
  • Avoid unnecessary final measure call on Auto/Auto cell #6637
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Tizen] Fix GetPath to return a correct path #6588
    platform/tizen
  • [Windows] MenuBarItems are now rendered when Shell.Title is not set #6497
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • Spike adding implictor styles to handle null colors #6255
    do-not-merge
  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    area/controls 🎮, area/infrastructure 🏗️, control-dualscreen
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Rework use of ObtainStyledAttributes so we can enable `AndroidLinkResources` #4912
    t/enhancement ☀️, platform/android 🤖, area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [Tizen] Bump Tizen.UIExtensions from 0.6.0-pre1 to 0.8.0-pre1 #6615
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, platform/tizen
  • Clean up the windows code a bit #6501
    platform/windows 🪟, area/hosting 🧩, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • [workload] Remove Microsoft.Maui.Extensions pack #5918
    do-not-merge, area/setup 🪄
  • [iOS] Observable collection events not firing in the correct order with CollectionView.BeginInvokeOnMainThread #6546
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.300-rc.3
  • Avoid notify changes from a null or disposed control #6060
    t/bug, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮
  • [src/Templates] Remove preview language #6622
    area/blazor 🕸️, do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300
  • Remove iOS Compat ColorExtension ToUIColor overlap #5854
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/migration 🚚
